summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on August 24, 2001. It includes information about the account holder, payment details, and service charges, indicating a transaction related to shipping services.

persons.name: Lauren Kwintner
persons.context: Lauren Kwintner is listed as the sender associated with the FedEx shipment detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Paul Hoffman
persons.context: Paul Hoffman is mentioned as the recipient of the package sent via FedEx, with an address provided in New York.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A package was shipped via FedEx, with the invoice detailing the transportation charges incurred.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 5-933-02196, dated August 24, 2001.
Total charges for the FedEx services amounted to USD 27.04.
The package was picked up on August 23, 2001, and delivered on August 24, 2001.
Lauren Kwintner is identified as the sender, while Paul Hoffman is the recipient.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge of USD 1.04.
